import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import {Row,Col, Image, ListGroup,Card, ListGroupItem, Button} from 'react-bootstrap'; import products from '../products'; import Rating from '../Component/Rating'; const ProductScreen = ({ match }) => { const product = products.find((p) => p._id === match.params.id); return ( <> Go Back

{product.name}

 price:{product.price} description:{product.description} Price${product.price} Stack{product.countInStock?'in Stock':'Out Of Stock'} ) } export default ProductScreen
